data.enText: a chemical element. Mercury is a poisonous silver liquid metal, used in thermometers .

tr: temperature measured by a mercury thermometer
a heavy silvery toxic univalent and bivalent metallic element
the only metal that is liquid at ordinary temperatures

value.def: Mercury is a silver-coloured liquid metal that is used especially in thermometers and barometers.

trans: 汞蒸气；汞灯；选择用一个水银蒸气；水银蒸气灯；水银蒸气
